00087 CDocument* vgui_mfc_view::GetDocument() // non-debug version is inline
00088 {
00089   ASSERT(m_pDocument->IsKindOf(RUNTIME_CLASS(CDocument)));
00090   return (CDocument*)m_pDocument;
